column4: anyone know how to change the log in manager theme for ubuntu 9.10 ?
the login manager is called "GDM" and you can find themes for it at gnome-looks. google will get you there.
might have to track down some tutorials on theming the latest version apparently
http://www.ubuntumini.com/2009/09/hack-karmics-gdm-login-screen.html - this should allow you to theme things
